TintMultiAutoCompleteTextView(android.co.FullName: public TintMultiAutoCompleteTextView (Context context, AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr)

Parameters: the id of the drawable to set as the background
setDropDownBackgroundResource(int).Description: Sets the background of the auto-complete drop-down list.

drawableStateChanged().Description: This function is called whenever the state of the view changes in such a way that it impacts the state of drawables being shown. If the View has a StateListAnimator, it will also be called to run necessary state change animations. Be sure to call through to the superclass when overriding this function.

ClassDesc: An tint aware @B_android#widget#MultiAutoCompleteTextView_E@. This will automatically be used when you use @B_android#widget#MultiAutoCompleteTextView_E@ in your layouts. You should only need to manually use this class when writing custom views.
